Cat Burglar.card_desc: [Prowl] Increase the damage of each of your daggers from your first dagger sets within 5s of Prowl ending by 30%.

Chase.card_desc: [Prowl] Increase the Movement Speed bonus while using Prowl by {scale=10|10}%.

Cut and Run.card_desc: [Armor] Increase your Movement Speed by {scale=10|10}% for 4s after getting a Killing Blow or Elimination.

Featherlite.card_desc: [Prowl] Reduce your damage taken by {scale=5|5}% while Prowl is active.

Fight or Flight.card_desc: [Nine Lives] Increase your Movement Speed by {scale=10|10}% for 2s after you activate Nine Lives.

On Edge.card_desc: [Nine Lives] Reduce the Cooldown of Nine Lives by {scale=1|1}s.

Patch Up.card_desc: [Nine Lives] Heal for an additional {scale=80|80} with Nine Lives.

Persistence.card_desc: [Armor] Reduce the damage you take by {scale=4|4}% while at or below 40% Health.

Predation.card_desc: [Armor] Increase your Movement Speed by {scale=10|10}% while Out of Combat.

Rogue's Gambit.card_desc: [Armor] Eliminations reset the Cooldown of Pounce, and increase the damage you deal with Pounce by 10%.

Scamper.card_desc: [Pounce] Increase your Movement Speed by {scale=10|10}% for 3s after using Pounce.

Scar Tissue.card_desc: [Nine Lives] Reduce your damage taken by {scale=5|5}% for 2s after using Nine Lives.

Shred.card_desc: [Pounce] Reduce the Cooldown of Pounce by {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Sixth Sense.card_desc: [Pounce] Reduce your damage taken by {scale=5|5}% for 2s after using Pounce.

Street Justice.card_desc: [Pounce] Pounce Executes targets at or below 35% Health.

Streetrunner.card_desc: [Prowl] Increase the duration of Prowl by {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Walk it Off.card_desc: [Prowl] Heal for {scale=40|40} every 1s while Prowl is active.

Beharrlichkeit.card_desc: [Rüstung] Bei 40% oder weniger Gesundheit wird erlittener Schaden um {scale=4|4}% reduziert.

Bereitschaft.card_desc: [Neun Leben] Reduziert die Abklingzeit von Neun Leben um {scale=1|1}s.

Federleicht.card_desc: [Pirsch] Während Pirsch wird erlittener Schaden um {scale=5|5}% reduziert.

Flitzen.card_desc: [Anspringen] Erhöht dein Lauftempo nach Aktivierung von Anspringen 3s lang um {scale=10|10}%.

Gassenl\u00e4ufer.card_desc: [Pirsch] Erhöht die Dauer von Pirsch um {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Jagd.card_desc: [Pirsch] Erhöht den Lauftempobonus von Pirsch um {scale=10|10}%.

Kampf oder Flucht.card_desc: [Neun Leben] Nach Aktivierung von Neun Leben erhöht sich dein Lauftempo 2s lang um {scale=10|10}%.

Laufende Heilung.card_desc: [Pirsch] Während Pirsch wirst du pro Sekunde {scale=40|40} LP geheilt.

Narbengewebe.card_desc: [Neun Leben] Nach Verwendung von Neun Leben wird erlittener Schaden 2s lang um {scale=5|5}% reduziert.

Pr\u00e4dation.card_desc: [Rüstung] Erhöht dein Lauftempo außerhalb des Kampfes um {scale=10|10}%.

Respekt.card_desc: [Rüstung] Erhöht deine maximale Gesundheit um {scale=50|50} LP.

Schnitt und weg.card_desc: [Rüstung] Eliminierungen erhöhen dein Lauftempo 4s lang um {scale=10|10}%.

Schurkengambit.card_desc: [Rüstung] Eliminierungen setzen die Abklingzeit von Anspringen zurück und Anspringen verursacht 10% mehr Schaden.

Sechster Sinn.card_desc: [Anspringen] Nach Verwendung von Anspringen wird erlittener Schaden 2s lang um {scale=5|5}% reduziert.

Springfloh.card_desc: [Pirsch] Deine ersten beiden geworfenen Dolche innerhalb von 5s nach dem Ende von Pirsch verursachen 30% mehr Schaden.

Wildheit.card_desc: [Anspringen] Nach Verwendung von Anspringen wirst du {scale=70|70} LP geheilt.

Zerfledderer.card_desc: [Anspringen] Reduziert die Abklingzeit von Anspringen um {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Zivilcourage.card_desc: [Anspringen] Anspringen eliminiert Ziele, deren Gesundheit bei 35% oder weniger liegt.

Zusammenflicken.card_desc: [Neun Leben] Erhöht die Heilung durch Neun Leben um {scale=80|80} LP.

Cambrioleuse.card_desc: [Traque] Pendant 5s après Traque, vos deux premières attaques infligent 30% de dégâts en plus.

Cavalcade.card_desc: [Assaut] Assaut augmente votre vitesse de {scale=10|10}% pendant 3s.

Chasse.card_desc: [Traque] Le bonus de vitesse de Traque augmente de {scale=10|10}%.

Cicatrice.card_desc: [Neufs vies] Vous subissez {scale=5|5}% de dégâts en moins pendant 2s après Neuf vies.

Escapade.card_desc: [Armure] Chaque élimination augmente votre vitesse de {scale=10|10}% pendant 4s.

Fuir ou agir.card_desc: [Neuf vies] Votre vitesse augmente de {scale=10|10}% pendant 2s après Neuf vies.

Justice de rue.card_desc: [Assaut] Assaut exécute les cibles qui ont moins de 35% de PV.

Pansement.card_desc: [Neuf vies] Neuf vies vous rend {scale=80|80} PV de plus.

Poids plume.card_desc: [Traque] Vous subissez {scale=5|5}% de dégâts en moins pendant Traque.

Pr\u00e9dation.card_desc: [Armure] Votre vitesse hors combat augmente de {scale=10|10}%.

Prise de risque.card_desc: [Armure] Assaut inflige 10% de dégâts supplémentaires et chaque élimination réinitialise son temps de recharge.

R\u00e9sistance.card_desc: [Traque] Pendant Traque, vous récupérez {scale=40|40} PV par seconde.

Sixi\u00e8me sens.card_desc: [Assaut] Vous subissez {scale=5|5}% de dégâts en moins pendant 2s après Assaut.

Sur le fil.card_desc: [Neuf vies] Neuf vies se recharge {scale=1|1}s plus vite.

T\u00e9nacit\u00e9.card_desc: [Armure] En dessous de 40% de PV, vous subissez {scale=4|4}% de dégâts en moins.

\u4e14\u6218\u4e14\u9000.card_desc: [九命灵猫] 使用九命灵猫后移动速度提升{scale=10|10}%，持续2秒

\u63a0\u98df.card_desc: [护甲] 脱离战斗后提高{scale=10|10}%移动速度

\u6495\u788e.card_desc: [飞扑] 飞扑的冷却时间降低{scale=0.5|0.5}秒

\u65e0\u89c6\u75db\u82e6.card_desc: [狩猎姿态] 在狩猎姿态期间每秒回复{scale=40|40}点生命值

\u7075\u732b\u98de\u8d3c.card_desc: [狩猎姿态] 狩猎姿态持续时间结束后的5秒内,前两次普通攻击的伤害提高30%

\u75a4\u75d5\u7ec4\u7ec7.card_desc: [九命灵猫] 使用九命灵猫后受到的伤害降低{scale=6|6}%，持续3秒

\u767e\u6298\u4e0d\u6320.card_desc: [护甲] 当你的生命值低于40%时，受到的伤害降低{scale=6|6}%

\u7b2c\u516d\u611f.card_desc: [飞扑] 使用飞扑后受到的伤害降低{scale=6|6}%，持续3秒

\u8214\u8210\u4f24\u53e3.card_desc: [九命灵猫] 九命灵猫现在会回复{scale=80|80}点生命

\u8857\u5934\u6b63\u4e49.card_desc: [飞扑] 基于目标已损生命值，飞扑可造成最多30%额外伤害

\u8857\u5934\u8dd1\u9177.card_desc: [狩猎姿态] 狩猎姿态的持续时间提高{scale=0.5|0.5}秒

\u8d4c\u547d\u523a\u5ba2.card_desc: [护甲] 飞扑的伤害提高10%，且击败敌人或助攻会重置飞扑的冷却时间

\u8eab\u8f7b\u5982\u71d5.card_desc: [狩猎姿态] 狩猎姿态期间获得{scale=5|5}%伤害减免

\u8ffd\u6355.card_desc: [狩猎姿态] 狩猎姿态的移动速度加成提高{scale=10|10}%

\u91ce\u6027\u672c\u80fd.card_desc: [飞扑] 飞扑成功命中后回复{scale=70|70}点生命值

\u95fb\u540d\u8857\u5934.card_desc: [护甲] 最大生命值提高{scale=50|50}点

\u98de\u5f71\u5feb\u5200.card_desc: [护甲] 击败敌人或助攻后移动速度提高{scale=10|10}%，持续4秒

\u98de\u6a90\u8d70\u58c1.card_desc: [飞扑] 飞扑结束后移动速度提高{scale=10|10}%，持续3秒

\u9ad8\u5ea6\u8b66\u89c9.card_desc: [九命灵猫] 九命灵猫的冷却时间降低{scale=1|1}秒

Al l\u00edmite.card_desc: [Nueve vidas] Se reduce la recarga de Nueve vidas en {scale=1|1}s.

Arreglo.card_desc: [Nueve vidas] Te curas {scale=80|80} PS más con Nueve vidas.

Brutalidad.card_desc: [Embate] Te curas {scale=70|70} PS tras usar Embate.

Cacer\u00eda.card_desc: [Armadura] Tu velocidad de movimiento aumenta un {scale=10|10}% mientras estés fuera de combate

Cicatriz.card_desc: [Nueve vidas] Se reduce el daño recibido un {scale=5|5}% durante 2s tras usar Nueve vidas.

Confianzuda.card_desc: [Armadura] Tu salud máxima aumenta en {scale=50|50} PS.

Corredor callejero.card_desc: [Merodeo] La duración de Merodeo aumenta en {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Correteo.card_desc: [Embate] Aumentas tu velocidad de movimiento un {scale=10|10}% durante 3s tras usar Embate.

Entereza.card_desc: [Merodeo] Te curas {scale=40|40} PS cada 1s mientras Merodeo esté activo.

Gambito p\u00edcaro.card_desc: [Armadura] Las eliminaciones restablecen la recarga de Embate y el daño que infliges aumenta un 10%.

Justicia de la Calle.card_desc: [Embate] Embate ejecuta objetivos con un 35% o menos de salud.

Ladrona nocturna.card_desc: [Merodeo] Aumenta hasta un 30% el daño de tus dagas a partir de tus primeros conjuntos de dagas en los 5s siguientes a que acabe Merodeo.

Pelear o huir.card_desc: [Nueve vidas] Tu velocidad de movimiento aumenta un {scale=10|10}% durante 2s tras activar Nueve vidas.

Persecuci\u00f3n.card_desc: [Merodeo] La bonificación de velocidad de movimiento al usar Merodeo aumenta un {scale=10|10}%.

Persistencia.card_desc: [Armadura] Se reduce el daño recibido un {scale=4|4}% si tu salud está al 40% o menos.

Peso liviano.card_desc: [Merodeo] Se reduce el daño recibido un {scale=5|5}% mientras esté activo Merodeo.

Sexto sentido.card_desc: [Embate] Se reduce el daño recibido un {scale=5|5}% durante 2s tras usar Embate.

Tajada y huida.card_desc: [Armadura] Aumentas tu velocidad de movimiento un {scale=10|10}% durante 4s tras asestar un golpe de gracia o conseguir una eliminación.

Trituradora.card_desc: [Embate] Se reduce la recarga de Embate un {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Agilidade Ardilosa.card_desc: [Armadura] Eliminações zeram o intervalo do Bote Súbito, e ele causa 10% mais dano.

Bandagem.card_desc: [Nove Vidas] Você se cura em {scale=80|80} de vida a mais com Nove Vidas.

Cicatrizada.card_desc: [Nove Vidas] Reduz o dano recebido em {scale=5|5}% por 2s depois de usar Nove Vidas.

Correria.card_desc: [Bote Súbito] Aumenta a velocidade de movimento em {scale=10|10}% por 3s após usar Bote Súbito.

Cortar e Correr.card_desc: [Armadura] Aumenta sua velocidade de movimento em {scale=10|10}% por 4s após dar o disparo fatal ou conseguir uma eliminação.

Dia da Ca\u00e7a.card_desc: [Armadura] Aumenta a velocidade de movimento em {scale=10|10}% enquanto estiver fora do combate.

Ficar ou fugir.card_desc: [Nove Vidas] Aumenta a velocidade de movimento em {scale=10|10}% por 2s após ativar Nove Vidas.

Justi\u00e7a das Ruas.card_desc: [Bote Súbito] Bote Súbito executa os alvos com 35% ou menos de vida.

No Limite.card_desc: [Nove Vidas] Reduz o intervalo de Nove Vidas em {scale=1|1}s.

Parceira.card_desc: [Armadura] Aumenta a sua vida máxima em {scale=50|50}.

Perseguir.card_desc: [Disparada] Aumenta em {scale=10|10}% o bônus da velocidade de movimento quando em Disparada.

Persist\u00eancia.card_desc: [Armadura] Recebe {scale=4|4}% menos dano enquanto estiver com 40% ou menos de vida.

Peso Pena.card_desc: [Disparada] Reduz o dano recebido em {scale=5|5}% enquanto está usando Disparada.

Picadinho.card_desc: [Bote Súbito] Reduz o intervalo do Bote Súbito em {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Pulo do Gato.card_desc: [Disparada] Cada uma das adagas do primeiro arremesso feito em até 5s após terminar a Disparada causam 30% mais de dano.

Selvageria.card_desc: [Bote Súbito] Você se cura em {scale=70|70} de vida após usar o Bote Súbito.

Sexto Sentido.card_desc: [Bote Súbito] Reduz o dano recebido em {scale=5|5}% por 2s depois de usar o Bote Súbito.

Suando a Camisa.card_desc: [Disparada] Você se cura em {scale=40|40} de vida a cada 1s enquanto Disparada estiver ativa.

Velocista Urbana.card_desc: [Disparada] Aumenta a duração de Disparada em {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

\u0411\u0435\u0439 \u0438\u043b\u0438 \u.card_desc: [Девять жизней] Активация Девяти жизней повышает вашу скорость передвижения на {scale=10|10}% на 2 с.

\u0413\u0438\u043c\u043d\u0430\u0441\u04.card_desc: [Рысканье] Первые две атаки кинжалами в течение 5 с. после окончания Рысканья наносят на 30% больше урона.

\u0414\u0438\u043a\u043e\u0441\u0442\u04.card_desc: [Бросок] После использования Броска вы исцеляетесь на {scale=70|70} ед.

\u0417\u0430\u043f\u043b\u0430\u0442\u04.card_desc: [Девять жизней] Девять жизней исцеляют вас еще на {scale=80|80} ед.

\u041a\u0430\u043a \u0440\u0443\u043a\u0.card_desc: [Рысканье] Пока действует Рысканье, вы исцеляетесь на {scale=40|40} ед. в секунду.

\u041d\u0430 \u0433\u0440\u0430\u043d\u0.card_desc: [Девять жизней] Перезарядка Девяти жизней сокращается на {scale=1|1} с.

\u041d\u043e\u0433\u0438 \u0432 \u0440\u.card_desc: [Броня] Ваша скорость передвижения повышается на {scale=10|10}% на 4 с. после устранения или нанесения смертельного удара.

\u041f\u0435\u0440\u044b\u0448\u043a\u04.card_desc: [Рысканье] Пока действует Рысканье, вы получаете на {scale=5|5}% меньше урона.

\u041f\u043e\u0433\u043e\u043d\u044f.card_desc: [Рысканье] Бонусная скорость передвижения во время Рысканья повышается на {scale=10|10}%.

\u041f\u0440\u043e\u0431\u0435\u0436\u04.card_desc: [Бросок] После применения Броска ваша скорость передвижения повышается на {scale=10|10}% на 3 с.

\u0420\u0443\u0431\u0446\u043e\u0432\u04.card_desc: [Девять жизней] После использования Девяти жизней вы получаете на {scale=5|5}% меньше урона в течение 2 с.

\u0423\u043b\u0438\u0447\u043d\u0430\u04.card_desc: [Броня] Ваше максимальное здоровье повышается на {scale=50|50} ед.

\u0423\u043b\u0438\u0447\u043d\u043e\u04.card_desc: [Бросок] Бросок казнит цели с уровнем здоровья 35% и ниже.

\u0423\u043f\u043e\u0440\u0441\u0442\u04.card_desc: [Броня] При уровне здоровья 40% и ниже входящий урон снижается на {scale=4|4}%.

\u0425\u0438\u0442\u0440\u044b\u0439 \u0.card_desc: [Броня] Устранения перезаряжают Бросок, который наносит на 10% больше урона.

\u0425\u0438\u0449\u043d\u0438\u0447\u04.card_desc: [Броня] Ваша скорость передвижения вне боя повышается на {scale=10|10}%.

\u0428\u0435\u0441\u0442\u043e\u0435 \u0.card_desc: [Бросок] После использования Броска вы получаете на {scale=5|5}% меньше урона в течение 2 с.

Blizna.card_desc: [Dziewięć żywotów] Zmniejsza odnoszone obrażenia o {scale=5|5}% przez 2 s po użyciu Dziewięciu żywotów.

Drapie\u017cnictwo.card_desc: [Pancerz] Zwiększa twoją szybkość ruchu o {scale=10|10}%, gdy jesteś poza walką.

Imitatorka.card_desc: [Polowanie] Zwiększa o 30% obrażenia od każdego twojego sztyletu z twoich dwóch pierwszych zestawów sztyletów w ciągu 5 s od zakończenia Polowania.

Kodeks ulicy.card_desc: [Skok] Skok eliminuje wrogów, którzy mają 35% PZ lub mniej.

\u0141atanina.card_desc: [Dziewięć żywotów] Dziewięć żywotów przywraca dodatkowe {scale=80|80} PZ.

Lekko\u015b\u0107 pi\u00f3rka.card_desc: [Polowanie] Zmniejsza odnoszone przez ciebie obrażenia o {scale=5|5}% podczas aktywności Polowania.

Miejski bieg.card_desc: [Polowanie] Wydłuża czas trwania Polowania o {scale=0.5|0.5} s.

Na kraw\u0119dzi.card_desc: [Dziewięć żywotów] Skraca czas odnowienia Dziewięciu żywotów o {scale=1|1} s.

Podst\u0119p \u0142otra.card_desc: [Pancerz] Eliminacje resetują czas odnowienia Skoku, a sam Skok zadaje o 10% więcej obrażeń.

Pogo\u0144.card_desc: [Polowanie] Zwiększa bonus do szybkości ruchu o {scale=10|10}% podczas trwania Polowania.

Prawo ulicy.card_desc: [Pancerz] Zwiększa twoje maks. zdrowie o {scale=50|50} PZ.

Rozchod\u017a to.card_desc: [Polowanie] Przywraca {scale=40|40} PZ co 1 s podczas trwania Polowania.

Sieczka.card_desc: [Skok] Skraca czas odnowienia Skoku o {scale=0.5|0.5} s.

Sz\u00f3sty zmys\u0142.card_desc: [Skok] Zmniejsza odnoszone przez ciebie obrażenia o {scale=5|5}% przez 2 s po użyciu Skoku.

Tnij i wiej.card_desc: [Pancerz] Zwiększa szybkość ruchu o {scale=10|10}% na 4 s po zadaniu Zabójczego ciosu lub udanej eliminacji.

Trucht.card_desc: [Skok] Zwiększa twoją szybkość ruchu o {scale=10|10}% na 3 s po użyciu Skoku.

Up\u00f3r.card_desc: [Pancerz] Zmniejsza odnoszone przez ciebie obrażenia o {scale=4|4}%, jeśli twój poziom zdrowia nie przekracza 40% PZ.

Walcz lub uciekaj.card_desc: [Dziewięć żywotów] Aktywacja Dziewięciu żywotów na 2 s zwiększa twoją szybkość ruchu o {scale=10|10}%.

Alt\u0131nc\u0131 His.card_desc: [Pençe] Pençe'yi kullandıktan sonraki 2sn boyunca aldığın hasarı %{scale=5|5} azalt.

Israr.card_desc: [Zırh] %40 Can veya altındayken aldığın hasarı %{scale=4|4} azalt.

Kedi H\u0131rs\u0131z.card_desc: [Sinsi] Sinsi bittikten sonra 5sn içindeki ilk set hançer atışında her birinin hasarını %30 artır.

Kes ve Ka\u00e7.card_desc: [Zırh] Bir Öldürücü Darbe veya Saf Dışı Bırakma yaptıktan sonra Hareket Hızını 4sn boyunca %{scale=10|10} artır.

Sab\u0131rs\u0131z.card_desc: [Dokuz Can] Dokuz Can'ın Bekleme Süresini {scale=1|1} sn azalt.

Sarg\u0131.card_desc: [Dokuz Can] Dokuz Can ek olarak {scale=80|80} Can iyileştirir.

Sava\u015f veya U\u00e7u\u015f.card_desc: [Dokuz Can] Dokuz Can'ı etkinleştirdikten sonra Hareket Hızını 2sn boyunca %{scale=10|10} artır.

Serseri Hamlesi.card_desc: [Zırh] Saf Dışı Bırakmalar, Pençe'nin Bekleme Süresini sıfırlar ve Pençe ile verdiğin hasarı %10 artırır.

Sokak Adaleti.card_desc: [Pençe] Pençe, %35 ve altında Canı olan hedefleri İnfaz Eder.

Tabanlar\u0131 Ya\u011fla.card_desc: [Pençe] Pençe kullandıktan sonra 3sn boyunca %{scale=10|10} Hareket Hızı kazan.

Yara Dokusu.card_desc: [Dokuz Can] Dokuz Can'ı kullandıktan sonraki 2sn boyunca aldığın hasarı %{scale=5|5} azalt.

Y\u00fcr\u00fc Ge\u00e7sin.card_desc: [Sinsi] Sinsi etkinken her 1 saniyede {scale=40|40} Can iyileş.
